recipesJson.name: Strawberry Peppermint I Scream
recipesJson.author: TorturedZen
recipesJson.description: TFA's peppermint is very strong-hence the low percentage. This needs to age at LEAST a week and It will blend in nicely with the VBIC. The Dbl Choc was added as an afterthought...... just because it seemed like it would work. And it works well!

reviews.text: Title and image is misleading, because strawberries are definitely not upfront even at those percentages. But the recipe as a whole is stellar. One of those recipes that you find weird at first, but appreciate more and more as you vape it. A chocolate peppermint milk with a slight hint of strawberries. Milk and vanilla flavors provide a rich base, chocolate is upfront, peppermint gives it a fun twist, and strawberries give it a friendly pink note. This already feels like something i would miss if not vaped for a while.
Over all good mint ice cream vape. Unfortunately strawberry is hard for me to taste even when swapping out CAP for INW 2%.
